The '''Wisdom Wolf Decay''' is a ninjutsu unique to Saiken. 

== Usage ==
Opening its mouth, Saiken releases a dense {{translation|corrosive gas|腐らせるガス|kuzaraseru gasu}}. Because of its gaseous nature, it can cover a wide cross-area in a short amount of time and is strong enough to instantly disintegrate a rather large tree.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 568, page 3</ref>

== Variants ==
In the anime, Utakata was seen using this technique in a liquid state as a stream of acid, potent enough to corrode the ground.<ref>''Naruto: Shippūden'' episode 324</ref>

== Trivia ==
* When Utakata used this technique in the anime, it was white. However, when used by Saiken, it was pink in the anime, but white in the video games.
